a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Prevalence of alcohol use disorders by age, World, 1990 to 2021
Share of the population within particular age categories suffering from alcohol use disorders. Alcohol
dependence is defined by the International Classification of Diseases as the presence of three or more
indicators of dependence for at least a month within the previous year.
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2024)
